summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating a portion of the ALLEY ADJACENT TO BLOCK 5, CREEDMORE ADDITION, being the alley in the Block between 22nd Avenue South and 23rd Avenue South and north of South Grand Street, on the petition of Belshaw Brothers Inc., accepting an easement for storm drain purposes and accepting a quit claim deed for street/alley purposes. (Comptroller File No. 294152).
